analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0xc8986ecd41fb420268f1f4285931379357c4142b.sol#353-368) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/17/0xc8986ecd41fb420268f1f4285931379357c4142b.sol#366)

YobCoinCrowdsale.extraMint (/unique_chucks/17/0xc8986ecd41fb420268f1f4285931379357c4142b.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(owner,_amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0xc8986ecd41fb420268f1f4285931379357c4142b.sol)

YobCoin.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0xc8986ecd41fb420268f1f4285931379357c4142b.sol#282)
